en.WelcomeMsg: Hi, this is the agent. How can I help you?
en.GoodbyeMsg: The agent has left the chat. Thank you for reaching out. Please contact us again if you need more help.

Bemba.GoodbyeMsg: Ichimbusa chapwisha imilimo yakulanda. Twatotela pakutuma kuno.Mukatutumine nakabili nga mwafwaya ubwafwilisho kuli baifwe.

Kaonde.WelcomeMsg: Baji byepi amuwa nenkwasho,ne mikwashe byepi?
Kaonde.GoodbyeMsg: Nkwasho wafumapo twasanta pakufika kwiatweba, mwakonsha kutuma lamya kimye kiji kyonse nga mwena kukeba bukwasho buji bonse.

Lozi.GoodbyeMsg: Mwelezi ufelize kwambola. Nitumezi ku amboli√Çsana,nikupa kuti ululizeze a katokwa tuso.

Lunda.WelcomeMsg: Nayimushi mwani ami nidi nkhong'u chuyikwashiku mwani?
Lunda.GoodbyeMsg: Ankhong'u adihu wanyi kusakililaku mwani, hakushika kudechu, mwani anachweshi kuchuma mpinji yidi yakazhima yana kukeng'a wukwashu.

Nyanja.WelcomeMsg: Hello ine ndine wauphungu kodi tingakuthandizeni bwanji?
Nyanja.GoodbyeMsg: Wauphungu achoka mkukambitsana nanu. Zikomo kwambili pa kukwanisa kukambisana ndi ife. Telo muli omasuka kutuma phone nthawi ina yonse pa thandizo lililonse?

Tonga.WelcomeMsg: Mooni,ndime sikulaya naa sikuyumyayumya. Inga ndamugwasya buti?
Tonga.GoodbyeMsg: Sikulaya/sikuyumyayumya wazwa lino amubandi. Twalumba kukwabana andiswe,Inga mwatuma lubo naa muciyanda lumbi lugwasyo.
